long_description: When it's time to trade in your boardshorts and bikinis for backpacks and books, the Jansport Oxidation daypack makes the journey just a little bit easier. Exterior-access, padded zip compartment carries a 15 in. laptop or a 3-liter hydration reservoir (sold separately). Main pocket carries textbooks, large binders, paperbacks, spiral notebooks, your hoodie and lunch. Front zippered pocket has a tricot-lined tablet pocket and organizer panel. Dual zippered insulated front pockets. Quick-access, tricot-lined top pocket is perfect for sunglasses or other delicate items. 2 open-top side pockets and zip stash pocket. Jansport Oxidation daypack has side and bottom compression straps and genuine leather JanSport label and trims. Padded S-curve shoulder straps provide a comfortable carry; sternum strap holds a heavy pack in place. Top carry handle.
short_description: When it's time to trade in your boardshorts and bikinis for backpacks and books, the Jansport Oxidation daypack makes the journey just a little bit easier.
